Title: RHSA-2019:3583: yum security, bug fix, and enhancement update (Moderate)
Description:
Yum is a command-line utility that allows the user to check for updates and automatically download and install updated RPM packages. Yum automatically obtains and downloads dependencies, prompting the user for permission as necessary. 

The following packages have been upgraded to a later upstream version: dnf (4.2.7), dnf-plugins-core (4.0.8), libcomps (0.1.11), libdnf (0.35.1), librepo (1.10.3), libsolv (0.7.4). (BZ#1690288, BZ#1690289, BZ#1690299, BZ#1692402, BZ#1694019, BZ#1697946)

Security Fix(es):

* libcomps: use after free when merging two objmrtrees (CVE-2019-3817)

* libsolv: illegal address access in pool_whatprovides in src/pool.h (CVE-2018-20534)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Additional Changes:

For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8.1 Release Notes linked from the References section.

Bugzillas.Title: microdnf - sockets not supported building layer on rhel8-beta/rhel-minimal image

Add support for modular errata
`dnf update`:  "Errors occurred during transaction" due to POSTUN scriptlet failures
[abrt] [faf] dnf: hdrFromFdno(): /usr/lib64/python3.6/site-packages/rpm/transaction.py killed by _rpm.error
yum  displays dnf  in -h
Be explicite about the REPODIR used in the Error message.
proxy bypass behavior incompatible with previous versions
CVE-2018-20534 libsolv: illegal address access in pool_whatprovides in src/pool.h
yum alias list does not work properly

CVE-2019-3817 libcomps: use after free when merging two objmrtrees

dnf list showduplicates incorrect output

missing yum-copr man page
option tsflags missing in dnf.conf

dnf not parsing default state of comps group correctly

do not mention switching streams with module enable
unable to install module content into nonstandard install root

Remove empty else block.

Rebase libdnf to >= 0.28.0
dnf continues despite an error code from test-transaction

When dnf plugin is upgraded via Obsolete, it is not run in the transaction phase

implement built-in log rotation
Inconsistency between dnf-automatic command name and man page name
using the @ module syntax for yum4 avoids the stream switching error protection
dnf update  --allowerasing just removes a package, without installing a new package.
DNF cannot work with installed modularity content if repo is disabled.

[microdnf] - UBI containers not "inherit" the subscription automatically from subscribed satellite content host
Test object to None after use it

Reposync should sync the entire repository to include module information. reposync should download the packages regardless of whether a module is enabled or disabled
